attributes.action: Award a Dame Hood to Olivia Newton - John - OBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British Born Olivia Newton John has for over 35 years plus entertained us and become one of our most popular female exports notably in the US and her adpoted home of Australlia.
She has sold millions of records and brought pleasure to her fans worldwide.
Dame Olivia would be a fitting gift from us to her in her 60th year.
